answers.answer: Unusual question for a diabetes forum. What makes you think an annual treadmill or stationary bike or an intravenous pharmacological stimulation cardiac stress test is in order? That is a question for your primary doctor and/or cardiologist as he/she knows your medical history and current health.

Hello and hope you are doing well.The heart stress test is done to basically stimulate the heart to reach stress levels, like with exercise and to study its functioning. The heart muscle needs more blood supply with exercise. As suggested above, if there is a specific indication like an abnormal EKG, or specific symptoms like chest pain, then it will help to have a stress test done. Any further doubts will be glad to answer.Hope this helped and do keep us posted.
